2: Just as I was about to head back to the attic,

3: Let's go back to the room and sleep."
4: I haven't bathed yet... I'm all sticky..."
5: \nl< >"I kind of hate it... even though I just washed...   \w[150]
6: "We can just wash during the day, okay?"
7: won't I be covered in \str[121]'s scent...?      \w[120]
It's smelly... but it's your smell... I love it... ♥"
8: \str[120] muttered a sleepy protest. for a moment,
I couldn't tell if she actually disliked the scent or not...
10: Her fingertips gently tugged at my sleeve,
issuing a faint plea in a voice that was almost fading away.
11: Naturally, I couldn't refuse \str[120]'s rare, spoiled request,
but in the next moment, I couldn't help but turn toward
that room nearby— a room I hadn't entered in a long time.
All sorts of thoughts suppressed deep in my heart suddenly flooded back.
12: "Yeah... I'll stay by your side tonight...
13: I nuzzled against her small face,
and after hearing her let out a low hum of satisfaction,
I walked straight toward that tightly closed door—
14: a refreshing scent of herbal olives wafted over me.
Though usually vacant, the room was pristine.
it was clear she had never ceased to tend to it.
15: Even though this place held such painful memories...
For some reason, tonight of all nights,
I wanted to spend it here with her...
17: Feeling the scent of the pillow, she let out a comfortable hum.
Enveloped in that faint, cool fragrance of olives,
she fell into a deep, peaceful slumber.
18: Not just tonight, but tomorrow and forever... I will find a way,
to make you completely healthy again..."
19: This tiny house is her entire world.
Ostracized by sunlight and the open air, unknown to the public,
She can't even take a single step outside.
I am the only one who has always stayed by her side.
20: This girl, who usually only moves about the attic
and finds bliss in her games,
what could she possibly be thinking as she
occasionally stares out the window at the world beyond?
21: Even if I am willing to stay with her forever,
the girl in this birdcage would only think
I am being burdened and imprisoned by her.
That's why I've been desperately searching
for the Elixir Rubrum, not even knowing if it would work...
22: she finally has a clear hope... right?
23: giving in to my lust for my own family,
finally laying hands on her body... what does that make me...?
24: If she knew that the 'amazing \str[121]' in her eyes
has actually been suppressing such wretched thoughts all this time,
25: Why did you have to call her my 'sister'...?"
26: I couldn't help but mutter a scoff at the man
who had long since departed this world.
But what is the truth of the matter, really...?
I’ll leave that until I've found the rest of the medicine.
27: my consciousness began to grow hazy.
In this quiet bedroom filled with the scent of olives,
I held her tight, and together,
we quickly plunged into a deep dream—
